solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int superPow(int a, int[] b) {--newline--        if (a % 1337 == 0) return 0;--newline--        int p = 0;--newline--        for (int i : b) p = (p * 10 + i) % 1140;--newline--        if (p == 0) p += 1440;--newline--        return power(a, p, 1337);--newline--    }--newline--    public int power(int a, int n, int mod) {--newline--        a %= mod;--newline--        int ret = 1;--newline--        while (n != 0) {--newline--            if ((n & 1) != 0) ret = ret * a % mod;--newline--            a = a * a % mod;--newline--            n >>= 1;--newline--        }--newline--        return ret;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
